name: Gaia Knight Dragon Hatchery
text: If this card is activated: Special Summon 1 "Curse of Dragon" From your Deck. You can Normal Summon 1 "curse of" monster or "Gaia" monster this turn, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set, and if it's Level 5 or higher, it does not require a Tribute (You only gain this effect once per turn). Once per turn: You can tribute 1 monster you control; add 1 "Cursed Fusion" from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Gaia Knight Dragon Hatchery" per turn, and only once that turn.
